text:
O Wrangler SPORT conta com um Hard Top preto modular Freedom Top, jantes FORGED , vidros laterais traseiros e vidro traseiro escurecidos, sistema de áudio Premium Alpine (8 altifalantes , subwoofer e amplificador de watts 552), moca em pele, degraus laterais com textura antiderrapante, cavas das rodas na cor da carroçaria, bancos dianteiros aquecidos, sensor crepuscular, sistema mãos-livres Uconnect Phone Bluetooth, display para monitorização da pressão dos pneus, volante em pele com comandos de áudio integrados e rádio com leitor de CD/DVD/MP3 e entrada aux, disco rígido de 40GB. etc...
equipamento extremo: (No valor de mais de 25.000 euros)
BLOQUEIOS ARB *1999x2=3998 euros
SUSPENSAO TERAFLEX FALCON CUMPRIDA SP2 *1840 euros*
MOLAS H&R euros*
EIXOS REFORCADOS DANA *3740 euros*
JANTES "METHOD RECE WHELL" MATTE BLACK FORGED .*2560 euros*
SUPERWINCH TIGERSHARK TS9500 SR * 1240 euros* Line Pull, 9,500 lbs: 340 Amps Motor Draw/4 FPM (1.2 MPM) Line Speed.
trans:
Wrangler SPORT features a Freedom Top modular black Hard Top, FORGED wheels, tinted rear side windows and rear window, Alpine premium audio system (8 speakers, subwoofer and 552-watt amplifier), leather seats, side steps with non-slip texture, body-coloured wheel arches, heated front seats, twilight sensor, Uconnect Phone Bluetooth hands-free system, tyre pressure monitoring display, leather steering wheel with integrated audio controls and radio with CD/DVD/MP3 player and aux entry, 40GB hard drive, etc...
extreme equipment: (valued at more than 25,000 euros)
ARB LOCKERS *1999x2=3998 euros
TERAFLEX FALCON FULL SP2 SUSPENSION  *1840 euros*
H&R CLIPS euros*
DANA REINFORCED AXLES *3740 euros*
"METHOD RECE WHELL" MATTE BLACK FORGED WHEELS. *2560 euros*
SUPERWINCH TIGERSHARK TS9500 SR * 1240 euros* Line Pull, 9,500 lbs: 340 Amps Motor Draw/4 FPM (1.2 MPM) Line Speed.
